Teresa BARTON, Appellant-Plaintiff,
v.
COLUMBUS ROBOTICS, INC., Columbus Festival of Lights, Inc., Paragon Meeting & Events, LLC, The City of Columbus, Indiana, and Reising Radio Partners, Inc., Appellees-Defendants Court of Appeals Case No. 03A01-1709-CT-1978 Court of Appeals of Indiana. Filed February 27, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

CRONE , J.

Affirmed.

ROBB, J., Concurs.

BRADFORD, J., Concurs.
